movie.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas!
movie.description_intro: Bitter and hateful, the Grinch is irritated at the thought of the nearby village having a happy time celebrating Christmas. So disguised as Santa Claus, with his dog made to look like a reindeer, he raids the village to steal all the Christmas things. The village is sure to have a sad Christmas this year.
movie.description_full: Bitter and hateful, the Grinch is irritated at the thought of the nearby village having a happy time celebrating Christmas. So disguised as Santa Claus, with his dog made to look like a reindeer, he raids the village to steal all the Christmas things. The village is sure to have a sad Christmas this year.

cast.name: Thurl Ravenscroft
cast.character_name: Singer 'You're a Mean One, Mr. Grinch'

movies.title: The Batman vs. Dracula
movies.summary: Gotham City is terrorized not only by recent escapees Joker and Penguin, but by the original creature of the night, Dracula! Can Batman stop the ruthless vampire before he turns everyone in the city, including The Caped Crusader, Joker and Penguin, into his mindless minions?
movies.description_full: Gotham City is terrorized not only by recent escapees Joker and Penguin, but by the original creature of the night, Dracula! movies.title: Mulan II
movies.summary: Fa Mulan gets the surprise of her young life when her love, Captain (now General) Li Shang asks for her hand in marriage. Before the two can have their happily ever after, the Emperor assigns them a secret mission, to escort three princesses to Qui Gong, China. Mushu is determined to drive a wedge between the couple after he learns that he will lose his guardian job if Mulan marries into the Li family. After the princesses unexpectedly fall in love with the Gang of Three, Mulan decides to help them escape the fate of marrying men they do not love. This contradicts the Emperor's orders and forces him to put Mulan's relationship with Shang into question. They are attacked by Mongolians, and the fate of China hangs in the balance.

movies.title: Goodnight Mr. Foot
movies.summary: Before the arrival of the first human in Hotel Transylvania (2012), the hulking Bigfoot checks into the secluded resort for all kinds of monsters, after meandering through the woods. There, in his cosy room, an overzealous witch-maid goes to great lengths to make certain that the exhausted customer has a good night's sleep. At Hotel Transylvania, they aim to please; however, when is enough, enough?

movies.title: The Condor
movies.summary: After his parents are murdered and his legs crippled, Tony Valdez uses their technology and becomes a skateboarding superhero.
